options.name: Subject Expert
options.description: Become Good at one Knowledge Skill

options.name: Polyglot
options.description: Learn one non-Magical Language and one Magical Language

options.name: Reaction : Hyperfocus
options.description: In response to making a Concentration Check from taking Damage while Focusing on a Spell, gain a 1d4 Bonus to that Check. If you successfully maintain Focus, gain a Bonus to any Defense Checks until the start of your next turn equal to the result of the d4.

options.name: Reaction : Interception
options.description: In response to a Creature making a Projectile or Ray Attack that travels within 10 Units of you, you Channel a Projectile or Ray Spell that takes 1 Action. Roll a 1d12 and add a +2 Bonus for each Level of the Spell you Channeled. If your Roll is greater than the initial Attack Roll, the Projectile or Ray is destroyed and does not reach its Target.

options.name: Exotic Magic
options.description: You choose one exotic school of magic which you can now research Beginner and Novice spells from. Journeyman spells can be researced at level 7 and Expert at level 9.
